      • addTransition

        void addTransition(java.lang.String fromState,
                 char onSymb,
                 java.lang.String toState)
        Adds the transition to the DFA's delta data structure
        Parameters:
        fromState - is the label of the state where the transition starts
        onSymb - is the symbol from the DFA's alphabet.
        toState - is the label of the state where the transition ends
